channel.title: Privacy on Skycoin Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Privacy on Skycoin Blog

item.title: Question Regarding Latency and Privacy of the Meshnet
item.description: This post refers to Skywire earlier on in its formation, before it was named Skywire. Adapted from a bitcointalk post dated August 09, 2014. Quote from: CraigM on August 09, 2014, 07:20:24 AM The meshnet is intended to be a nice privacy tool with benefits comparable to tor, but lower latency correct? The meshnet is intended to allow funding nodes via micropayments in skycoin to cover bandwidth costs correct?
